properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS  UNTIL 270159Z MAR
   BY M/V SANCO STAR TOWING THREE 200 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   22-15.10S 040-03.90W, 22-27.83S 039-54.27W,
   22-32.25S 039-56.73W, 22-23.85S 040-10.05W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 644/13.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 270259Z MAR 13.
